original: intros f a b If H. unfold is_RInt in *. unfold filterlim in *. unfold opp in *. apply (filterlim_comp _ _ _ _ _ (Riemann_sum f) _ loc_AbsRing). - apply (is_RInt_comp_opp _ _ _ _ H). - apply (filterlim_locally_ball_norm _ _ _ _ _ _ loc_AbsRing). intros eps. exists eps. intros y Hball. unfold ball_norm in Hball. apply Hball.
